Detailed Description

cvmx_uahc::_grxfifosiz#

The application can program the internal RAM start address/depth of the each RxFIFO as shown below. It is recommended that software use the default value. In Host mode, per-port registers are implemented. One register per FIFO.

Reset values = 0:[0x0000_0084] 1:[0x0084_0104] 2:[0x0188_0180].

This register can be reset by IOI reset or with UCTL()_CTL[UAHC_RST].
